Token.Abstract: An NSError class extension that provides Mockingbird-specific functionality.
Constructs a new NSError instance in the error domain specified by the kMBErrorDomain constant.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSError instance with the specified settings.

Token.Abstract: Constructs a new NSError instance in the error domain specified by the kMBErrorDomain constant.

Parameter.Name: dict
Parameter.Abstract: The user info dictionary for the returned error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSError instance with the specified settings.

Token.Abstract: Constructs a new NSError instance in the error domain specified by the kMBErrorDomain constant.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key whose corresponding value will be stored in the returned error's user info dictionary.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The value that will be associated with key.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSError instance with the specified settings.

Token.Abstract: Constructs a new NSError instance in the error domain specified by the kMBErrorDomain constant.

Parameter.Name: desc
Parameter.Abstract: The description of the error, which will be available through the user info key NSLocalizedDescriptionKey as well as the error's localizedDescription method.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSError instance with the specified settings.

Token.Abstract: Constructs a new NSError instance in the error domain specified by the kMBErrorDomain constant.

Parameter.Name: desc
Parameter.Abstract: The description of the error, which will be available through the user info key NSLocalizedDescriptionKey as well as the error's localizedDescription method.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSError instance with the specified settings.

Token.Abstract: Constructs a new NSError instance in the error domain specified by the kMBErrorDomain constant.

Parameter.Name: desc
Parameter.Abstract: The description of the error, which will be available through the user info key NSLocalizedDescriptionKey as well as the error's localizedDescription method.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key whose corresponding value will be stored in the returned error's user info dictionary.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The value that will be associated with key.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSError instance with the specified settings.

Token.Abstract: Constructs a new NSError instance in the error domain specified by the kMBErrorDomain constant.

Parameter.Name: ex
Parameter.Abstract: The NSException to wrap in the returned error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSError instance with the specified settings.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new NSError instance by adding the specified user info dictionary value to that of the receiver.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key whose corresponding value will be stored in the returned error's user info dictionary.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The value that will be associated with key.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSError instance with the same settings as the receiver, but with the specified user info value added.
